text: &&*gnEqyIM kRu#ShNagrIqvI(gm) sa(gm)#hiqtAmaiqndrI(gg) SvEqtAM bA#r.haspaqtyAmEqtA Eqva dEqvatAqH svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq tA EqvAsmi#n brahmavarcaqsaM da#dhati brahmavarcaqsyE#va Ba#vati vaqsantA$ prAqtarA$gnEqyIM kRu#ShNa grIqvImA la#BEta grIqShmE maqddhyandi#nE sa(gm)hiqtAmaiqndrI(gm) Saqradya#parAqhNE SvEqtAM bA#r.haspaqtyAM trINiq vA A#diqtyasyaq tEjA(gm)#si vaqsantA$ prAqtargrIqShmE maqddhyandi#nE Saqradya#parAqhNE yAva#ntyEqva tEjA(gm)#siq tAnyEqvA - [  ]  11
